content: कुप् {vI.v} {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (कुप्यति, चुकोप, अकुपत्, कोपितुं, कुपित) {@--1@} To be angry, (generally with the <ab>dat.</ab> of the person who is the object of anger, but sometimes with the <ab>acc.</ab> or <ab>gen.</ab> also); कुप्यतिं हितवादिने <ls>K. 108</ls>; कुपितश्चंद्रगुप्तश्चाणक्यस्योपरि <ls>Mu. 2</ls>; <ls>M. 3. 21</ls>; <ls>U. 7</ls>; चुकोप तस्मै स भृशं <ls>R. 3. 56.</ls> {@--2@} To be excited, to gather strength, be virulent; as in दोषाः प्रकुप्यंति <ls>Suśr.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (कोपयति-ते) {@--1@} To provoke, irritate; to excite, agitate. {@--2@} To stir up. {vII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To shine. {@--2@} To speak.
